Package com.javagameengine.events

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Listener
    Interface for classes that respond to Events handled by the EventManager class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Event
    Base class for events.
    EventManager
    Handles Events and Listeners.
    InputEvent
    Describes an Event that is associated with user input devices such as the mouse or keyboard.
    KeyEvent
    Describes a keyboard event in which a key is pressed, released, or held.
    MouseClickEvent
    Event describing a mouse button being clicked.
    MouseEvent
    Abstract event that describes an event triggered by a mouse.
    MouseMoveEvent
    Event describing a mouse moving across the screen.
    MouseScrollEvent
    Event describing the scroll wheel on the mouse being moved up or down.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EventMethod.Priority
    Event priority that determines in what order this event method is called.
    KeyEvent.Type  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    EventMethod
    Annotation for Listener class event methods
